comment: Smart Data Models - DiscExcContIEEEDEC1A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/DiscExcContIEEEDEC1A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Type DEC1A discontinuous excitation control model that boosts generator excitation to a level higher than that demanded by the voltage regulator and stabilizer immediately following a system fault.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 12.2.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: esc
contents.comment: Speed change reference ().  Typical Value = 0.0015. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kan
contents.comment: Discontinuous controller gain ().  Typical Value = 400. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ketl
contents.comment: Terminal voltage limiter gain ().  Typical Value = 47. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tan
contents.comment: Discontinuous controller time constant ().  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0

contents.name: td
contents.comment: Time constant ().  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0

contents.name: tl1
contents.comment: Time constant ().  Typical Value = 0.025. Default: 0

contents.name: tl2
contents.comment: Time constant ().  Typical Value = 1.25. Default: 0

contents.name: tw5
contents.comment: DEC washout time constant ().  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

contents.name: val
contents.comment: Regulator voltage reference ().  Typical Value = 5.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vanmax
contents.comment: Limiter for Van (). Default: 0.0

contents.name: vomax
contents.comment: Limiter ().  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vomin
contents.comment: Limiter ().  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vsmax
contents.comment: Limiter ().  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vsmin
contents.comment: Limiter ().  Typical Value = -0.066. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vtc
contents.comment: Terminal voltage level reference ().  Typical Value = 0.95. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vtlmt
contents.comment: Voltage reference ().  Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vtm
contents.comment: Voltage limits ().  Typical Value = 1.13. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vtn
contents.comment: Voltage limits ().  Typical Value = 1.12. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
